definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: At the same time, the use of coal exhaustive method to optimize selection.
sentences.chinese: 同时利用穷举法对配煤进行优化选取。

sentences.english: The secondary screens receive the coal from the crushers and remove the fines.
sentences.chinese: 经压碎后的煤通过第二道筛，筛出细粉。

sentences.english: Papa would bring an old battered coal shovel and an old-fashioned ice chest with him.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷总会带来一把破旧的煤铲和一台老式冰柜。

sentences.english: The surface hydrophobicity of coal increases by adsorbing nitrifying bacteria and quinoline in surface.
sentences.chinese: 通过吸附硝化细菌和喹啉在表面增加煤的表面疏水性。

sentences.english: I stirred up the cinders, and fetched a scuttleful myself.
sentences.chinese: 我搅动一下那些余烬，自己去取了一煤斗的煤。

sentences.english: Meso - carbon microbeads (MCMBs) were prepared from coal tar pitch by condensation.
sentences.chinese: 以煤沥青为原料，采用热缩聚法制备中间相炭微球。

sentences.english: Add some more coal to keep the fire going.
Five pieces of coal, a carrot, and a scarf are lying on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 五块煤，一个胡萝卜，一条围巾在草地上。

sentences.english: Alberta also produces more coal than any other province.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔伯达出产的煤也多于其他任何省份。

sentences.english: But China has launched two major coal-to-liquid projects.
sentences.chinese: 但中国启动了两个主要的煤转油工程。

sentences.english: Coal delivered to southern China currently sells for $114 per ton.
sentences.chinese: 运往中国南方的煤目前售价为114美元一吨。

sentences.english: And Italy is not alone in its return to coal.
sentences.chinese: 然而，不仅仅是意大利重返用煤发电。

sentences.english: It's my job to see that the boilers are stocked up last thing at night.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是负责临睡前给锅炉添好过夜煤。

sentences.english: The modified coal tar pitches behaves in non-Newton fluid.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，改性煤沥青摘要表现出非牛顿流体行为。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the coke pushing and coal loading operating system in coke oven.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了焦炉推焦和装煤操作系统内容。

sentences.english: The engineer shoveled the coal in as fast as he could.
sentences.chinese: 那个工程师尽快地把煤铲进去。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
